personal_statement: Driven and enthusiastic computer science graduate seeking an internship in tech to apply and expand my skills in real-world settings. With a strong academic record, sharp analytical thinking, and hands-on experience in AI-powered applications and software development, I bring both creativity and technical depth. I'm eager to contribute to impactful projects, learn from professional individuals, and thrive in an innovative environment.

experience.title: IT Intern
experience.place: General Administration of Information Technology at the University of Tabuk
bullets: Gained practical knowledge in IT infrastructure and security policies.
Created Use Case diagrams, flowcharts, and technical documentation as well as database management for software projects.
Developed "Technical Support System", a full-stack web application using Angular and Django.

experience.title: Introductory Artificial Intelligence Training Program
bullets: Selected through an entry exam for a 40-hour intensive training on machine learning fundamentals.
Designed and trained ML models with focus on preprocessing, evaluation, neural networks, regularization, and dimensionality reduction.

relevant_skills.libraries: Flask, React Native, HTML, CSS, node.js, Git, NumPy, Pandas, Pytesseract, Docker, Unity game engine
relevant_skills.other: Strong understanding of software development principles and RAG pipeline. Experience with AI/ML model development, full-stack web applications, and mobile app development.
